Title: How economy changed throughout the pandemic.
I looked very closely at this graph and I noticed the decrease of consumer spending in certain economic sectors. If we pay attention to the percentages, we can sefely say that consumers tended to spend money on superficial objects (such as building materials) rather than clothes and such. I personally think this graphic made me actually realized the whole situation in America: how the economy was changing, the consequences, which sector was getting the most attention during the pandemic and what the new priorities have become.
